name: redo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to do something again: These new measurements mean that I'll have to redo the calculations.
If you redo a room or a building, you paint it, put new furniture in it, etc. to make it more attractive or useful: We spent €5,000 redoing the kitchen.
